span.p:
Teacher Model
GPT-4 / Claude · 175B params
High accuracy · High cost · 2000ms

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Student Model
GPT-4-mini · 8B params
Good accuracy · Low cost · 200ms

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Step 2: Train student on teacher outputs
Target: teacher response · Loss: KL divergence + task loss

div.style: color: rgb(255, 255, 255) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Step 3: Evaluate and iterate
Compare student vs teacher · Add hard examples · Repeat
